statements: SELECT * FROM employee_access WHERE access_level = 'high';
SELECT name, access_level FROM employee_access WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_access WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name FROM employee_access WHERE access_level = 'medium' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, access_level FROM employee_access WHERE access_level IN ('low', 'high') ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_access WHERE access_level = 'high';
SELECT name, access_level FROM employee_access WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name FROM employee_access WHERE access_level = 'low';
SELECT * FROM employee_access ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, access_level FROM employee_access WHERE name LIKE '%e%';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT material_name, sensitive_info FROM building_materials WHERE access_restrictions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, department, access_level FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM building_materials WHERE material_id <= 100;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE access_level >= 3 AND department = 'HR';
SELECT material_name, access_restrictions FROM building_materials WHERE material_id <= 100 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT name, department, access_level FROM employees WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' AND department <> 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE sensitive_info LIKE '%confidential%' AND access_restrictions IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT material_name FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Wood';

SELECT employee_name, material_name FROM employees JOIN access_logs ON employees.employee_id = access_logs.employee_id JOIN building_materials ON access_logs.material_id = building_materials.material_id;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM building_materials;

SELECT e.employee_name, m.material_name, a.access_time FROM employees e JOIN access_logs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id JOIN building_materials m ON a.material_id = m.material_id ORDER BY a.access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT department_name AS department, manager_id FROM departments WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE access_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT employee_name, department, level_name FROM employees INNER JOIN access_levels ON employees.access_level = access_levels.access_level WHERE employees.department = 'HR'

SELECT employee_name, department, level_name FROM employees INNER JOIN access_levels ON employees.access_level = access_levels.access_level WHERE access_levels.access_level > 1 ORDER BY level_name ASC
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM employee_access;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_access WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, location FROM building_information;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, building_id FROM employee_buildings ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_access;
SELECT employee_id, access_level FROM employee_access ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT employee_id, building_id FROM employee_buildings WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'steel';
SELECT building_id, building_name, location FROM building_information WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
